text:
Instead of querying your database, you can use an ID to retrieve individual objects.


  Additional information
  


## Get an object by id

Use an ID to retrieve an object. If the id doesn't exist, Weaviate returns a 404 error.


  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  



## Retrieve the object's vector

Object vectors can be retrieved by specifying its return.


  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  


## Retrieve named vectors

Where [named vectors](../config-refs/schema/multi-vector.md) are used, you can retrieve one or more of them by specifying their names.


  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  

  
    
  



## Check object existence

To efficiently check if an object with a given [id](../api/graphql/additional-properties.md#id) exists without retrieving it, make a `HEAD` request to the [`/v1/objects/` REST endpoint](/developers/weaviate/api/rest#tag/objects/head/objects/{className}/{id}), or use the following client code:
